item.title: Fast yet Safe: Early-Exiting with Risk Control
item.description: Risk control boosts early-exit neural networks’ speed and safety by ensuring accurate predictions before exiting early, achieving substantial computational savings across diverse tasks.

item.title: Variational Flow Matching for Graph Generation
item.description: CatFlow: a novel flow matching method for graph generation, offering superior computational efficiency and performance.
